SELECT * FROM MONTHLY_SELLER
SELLER_NUMBER = #{searchInput}
SELLER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'
SELLER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'
TRUNC(SELLER_REGISTER_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
TRUNC(SELLER_REGISTER_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1
ORDER BY SELLER_REGISTER_DATE DESC

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NUMBER, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_STATUS, B.BRAND_NAME, P.PRODUCT_REGISTER_DATE, S.SELLER_PHONE_NUMBER, S.SELLER_EMAIL, S.SELLER_NAME FROM MONTHLY_PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN MONTHLY_BRAND B ON P.BRAND_NUMBER = B.BRAND_NUMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN MONTHLY_SELLER S ON B.SELLER_NUMBER = S.SELLER_NUMBER
P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = #{searchInput}
B.BRAND_NAME LIKE '%' ||#{searchInput}|| '%'
P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'

SELECT U.USER_NUMBER,U.USER_NAME,U.USER_STATUS,U.USER_ID,U.USER_PHONE_NUMBER,S.SUBS_START_DATE,U.USER_BIRTHDAY,U.USER_EMAIL,P.PRODUCT_NAME FROM MONTHLY_USER U LEFT OUTER JOIN MONTHLY_SUBSCRIBE S ON S.USER_NUMBER =U.USER_NUMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN MONTHLY_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER= S.PRODUCT_NUMBER -- WHERE U.USER_NUMBER = 61
U.USER_NUMBER = #{searchInput}
U.USER_NAME LIKE '%' ||#{searchInput}|| '%'
U.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'
ORDER BY U.USER_NUMBER DESC

SELECT MP.PRODUCT_NUMBER,MP.PRODUCT_NAME ,MB.BRAND_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(SUBS_NUMBER) FROM MONTHLY_SUBSCRIBE MS WHERE PRODUCT_NUMBER = MP.PRODUCT_NUMBER) AS SUBS_NUMBER_COUNT FROM MONTHLY_PRODUCT MP JOIN MONTHLY_BRAND MB on MP.BRAND_NUMBER = MB.BRAND_NUMBER WHERE SELLER_NUMBER =#{sellerNumber} ORDER BY PRODUCT_NUMBER
SELECT BRAND_NAME FROM MONTHLY_BRAND WHERE SELLER_NUMBER = #{sellerNumber}

SELECT U.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_ID, S.SUBS_NUMBER, S.SUBS_START_DATE, B.BRAND_NUMBER, P.PRODUCT_NUMBER,P.PRODUCT_NAME FROM MONTHLY_SUBSCRIBE S LEFT OUTER JOIN MONTHLY_USER U ON U.USER_NUMBER = S.USER_NUMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN MONTHLY_PRODUCT P ON S.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN MONTHLY_BRAND B ON P.BRAND_NUMBER = B.BRAND_NUMBER
WHERE S.PRODUCT_NUMBER = #{productNumber}
AND U.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{subscriberInput} || '%'
AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM S.SUBS_START_DATE) = EXTRACT(DAY FROM SYSDATE + 3)

SELECT TO_CHAR(m.BRAND_REGISTER_DATE, 'MM-DD') AS BRAND_REGISTER_DATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN s.SELLER_STATUS = 1 THEN 1 END) AS SELLER_STATUS_ONE_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN s.SELLER_STATUS = 2 THEN 1 END) AS SELLER_STATUS_TWO_COUNT FROM MONTHLY_BRAND m JOIN MONTHLY_SELLER s ON m.SELLER_NUMBER = s.SELLER_NUMBER WHERE m.BRAND_REGISTER_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 2 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(m.BRAND_REGISTER_DATE, 'MM-DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(m.BRAND_REGISTER_DATE, 'MM-DD')

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN s.SELLER_STATUS = 1 THEN 1 END) AS SELLER_STATUS_ONE_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN s.SELLER_STATUS = 2 THEN 1 END) AS SELLER_STATUS_TWO_COUNT FROM MONTHLY_BRAND m JOIN MONTHLY_SELLER s ON m.SELLER_NUMBER = s.SELLER_NUMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(m.BRAND_REGISTER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM')

SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN s.SELLER_STATUS = 1 THEN 1 END) / 3, 2), 'FM9999999990.00') AS SELLER_STATUS_ONE_COUNT, TO_CHAR(ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN s.SELLER_STATUS = 2 THEN 1 END) / 3, 2), 'FM9999999990.00') AS SELLER_STATUS_TWO_COUNT FROM MONTHLY_BRAND m JOIN MONTHLY_SELLER s ON m.SELLER_NUMBER = s.SELLER_NUMBER WHERE m.BRAND_REGISTER_DATE >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3), 'MM')
